Html:
Is it possible to delete "Back" button from the menu bar?
Please help.

1. Download the Source Code
  2. Open the Solution
  3. in FirstFloor.ModernUI --> Themes -->ModernWindow.xaml Find the back button control and set its visible to hide re compile and use the new compiled dll to you application .
